ticker tape.translation[0].definitions[0: long narrow paper on which information, for example the price of company stocks, is printed by a special machine
ticker tape.translation[1].definitions[0: long narrow paper on which information or news is printed by a special machine as soon as events have happened
ticker tape.translation[1].definitions[1: a computer screen that shows information about the buying and selling of shares
Several large trades showed on the ticker tape.
